titles.title: Providing for a required response by the House of Representatives to any special direct spending message submitted by the President.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 240, H. Res. 235 is considered passed House.

bill.summary: 8/4/1993--Introduced. Provides that specified provisions, procedures, and points of order set forth in H.R. 2264 as passed the House of Representatives (103d Congress) requiring a response to any special direct spending message submitted by the President shall apply in the House for FY 1994 through 1997.
